original: Ehn, Gustaf Artur Herman, postmästare, Karlskrona, f. 6/6/89 i Träslöv, Hall. 1., av Johan Adolf E. o. Gertrud Gustafsson. — Realex. i Nyköp. 07, språkstud. i Engl. E. o. post-exp. i v. distr. 09, e. dito 12, postexp. 13, v. järnv:posten i v. distr. 14, v. po’stdirekt. i samma distr. 17, tf. förste postexp. v. gen ipoststyr. 25, tf. förste postassist. där s. å., förste post-assist. i Gbg 26, kontrollör v. gen:-poststyr. 31, förste dito v. postdirekt. i ö. distr. 37, postmäst. i Kinna 38, överkontrollör v. postdirekt. i ö. distr. 40, postmäst. v. Karlskrona I sed. 42. RVO.
translated: Ehn, Gustaf Artur Herman, postmaster, Karlskrona, b. 6/6/89 in Träslöv, Halland, son of Johan Adolf E. and Gertrud Gustafsson. He attended the Realskola in Nyköping in 1907, studied languages in England and worked in the Western District Post Office in 1909, becoming a regular employee in 1912 and a postman in 1913. He worked for the Western District Railway Post Office in 1914, was a deputy first postman in the general post office in 1925, a deputy first postal assistant in the same year, a first postal assistant in Gothenburg in 1926, a controller in the general post office in 1931, and a first controller at the post office in the eastern district in 1937. He became postmaster in Kinna in 1938, chief controller at the post office in the eastern district in 1940, and postmaster in Karlskrona in 1942. He was awarded the Royal Order of the Sword (RVO). He married but the partner's name is not mentioned in this abbreviated biography.

organization.name: Post Office in the Eastern District
Post Office in the Eastern District
